overview: Riley gets caught dreaming in class, so her Prof will have to fuck her back to reality. Cindy is having trouble reading her play for Prof. Stone's drama course, but that's because she isn't living the role. Principle Gunn receives tons of complaints about Kelly pissing off staff members, so he springs into action to discipline her. Natalie bets her friend $50 that she can get the janitor to stick it to her. Pete refuses at first, but Natalie has a way of getting what she wants.
title: Bad Little Schoolgirls
